solution_line_template: If it takes Moe {time_to_eat_initial_pieces} seconds to eat {initial_pieces_eaten} cuttlebones, then in one second she eats {initial_pieces_eaten} cuttlebones / {time_to_eat_initial_pieces} seconds = <<{initial_pieces_eaten}/{time_to_eat_initial_pieces}={cuttlebones_per_second}>>{cuttlebones_per_second} cuttlebones/second

Since the cat eats {cuttlebones_per_second} pieces of cuttlebone in 1 second, {target_pieces} pieces will be {target_pieces} cuttlebones / {cuttlebones_per_second} cuttlebones/second = <<{target_pieces}/{cuttlebones_per_second}={time_to_eat_target_pieces}>>{time_to_eat_target_pieces} seconds.
